short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plugin to Detect and Prevent Malicious Browser Usage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This app is intended for SW employees. If not an SW employee, please delete. 

This extension will monitor web usage and raise alerts to you if something suspicious has occurred. It will also deflect attempts at phishing and other social engineering web attacks.

This product is in Beta. Please use the feedback feature to alert us to any issues or concerns.
